org.franca.core.utils

Interface IFrancaValidator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractFrancaValidator, FDeployRecursiveValidator, FrancaRecursiveValidator

    public interface IFrancaValidator
    Interface for validators of multi-resource models consisting of fidl- and fdepl-files.
    Author:
    Klaus Birken (itemis)
